FinServ_Employment__c.name: FinServ_Employment__c
FinServ_Employment__c.description: Represents information about an individual’s employment history.

AnnualIncome__c.description: Gross annual income as reported on the most recent tax return.

EmploymentStatus__c.description: Employment status. Valid values: Employed Self-Employed Homemaker Retired Student Unemployed with Income Unemployed Without Income

LengthOfEmployment__c.description: Length of employment in years (to two decimal places).

Occupation__c.description: Job category. Valid values: Architecture and Engineering Arts, Design, Entertainment, Sports, and Media Building and Grounds Cleaning or Maintenance Community and Social Service Computer and Mathematical Construction and Extraction Education, Training, and Library Farming, Fishing, and Forestry Food Preparation and Serving Healthcare Practitioners and Technical Healthcare Support Installation, Maintenance, and Repair Legal Life, Physical, and Social Science Management Office Admin Other Personal Care and Service Production Protective Service Sales Transportation and Material Moving

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the individual in an external data source.

StartDate__c.description: Date the individual began working for current employer.
